channel.title: Runserv wont work
channel.description: ok im using the csk download serv and when i go to runserv it pops up and goes away any ideas? I'm not sure if its something to do with java, or the client is just a bad java type, im clueless :confused:

item.title: Runserv wont work

item.description:
@k_t0_the_0 wrote:

ok ill give either of them a shot…and i didnt have the java update so that could be it =p

item.title: Runserv wont work
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

i had the same problem yesterday and this is what i did: edit both run.bat and compile.bat and put this in:

[code]TITLE woofdawg23’s awsome compiler + runner
@ECHO OFF
CD files
color 09

:info
CLS
ECHO woofdawg23’s awsome compiler + runner
ECHO.
ECHO ~By Woofdawg23~
ECHO If you leech i will take to further actions…
ECHO.
ECHO
ECHO.
ECHO ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
ECHO.
ECHO Type r to Run Client.
ECHO.
ECHO Type c to Compile.
ECHO.
ECHO Type e to Exit.
ECHO.
SET option=
SET /p option=choose an option please . . .
if %option%==r goto runclient
if %option%==c goto compile
if %option%==e exit

:runclient
@echo off
TITLE WideScreen Client
java -Xmx500m -cp . client
pause
ECHO.
ECHO.
GOTO info

:compile
@echo off
COLOR 09
title compile
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac” -cp . *.java
pause
ECHO
ECHO
GOTO info
[/code]

make sure u got the latest jdk (6u3)

Read full topic
